about_the_game:
The “Adult Only” visual novel Happy Conquistador tells the story of Enrique, a Spanish conquistador who embarks on a mission vital for the Spanish Empire. Lead the ship through the ocean, fight for gold and lands, and bring glory to the Spanish Crown.

Game features:

- With over 60,000 words, the game is full of jokes and story.
- A gallery of high-quality adult images with four different girls: Anele, a wife of an African chieftain; Layla, a daughter of an Arabian diplomat; Li Mei, a Chinese tea vendor; and Izel, a Mayan warrior.
- The player has complete control over the main character’s behavior. Choose peace and love, struggle for domination, build your personal fortune, or secure the Crown’s interests.
- There are at least five different endings, with several additional sub-endings in accordance with the gameplay choices.

The game doesn’t reflect any kind of historical viewpoint and is made for entertainment purposes only. All events are fictional, and all coincidences are random.
